title: Understanding Relative Frequency
text: Relative frequency is calculated by dividing the number of people who prefer a specific pet by the total number of people surveyed.

title: Calculate Relative Frequency for Dogs
text: To find the relative frequency of people who prefer dogs, divide the number of dog lovers by the total number of participants.

title: Calculate Relative Frequency for Cats
text: Similarly, calculate the relative frequency for cats by dividing the number of cat lovers by the total number of participants.

title: Compare the Frequencies
text: Compare the relative frequencies of dog and cat preferences to determine which is less.

title: Final Comparison
text: Is the relative frequency of people who prefer dogs less than that of people who prefer cats?
